alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Essex, east central Worcester and north central Middlesex Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bolton, or near Marlborough, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Methuen, Billerica, Marlborough, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, Westford, Acton, Hudson, Concord, Sudbury, Clinton, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Maynard and Littleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
